nodes.text: The Zona Miki route was a hyperspace route in the Outer Rim Territories that reached the Zona Miki system.

By 1750 BBY, the new Sith leader Dark Underlord assailed the space stations along the Zona Miki route with his Black Knights. The Galactic Republic fought back by hiring Mandalorian mercenaries who helped the Jedi to defeat Dark Underlord on Malrev IV.
